::Switchblade/Astroblast::
Switchblade jumps into Astroblast, "Nice and roomy!" he 
exclaimes as he sits down in Astroblast's main command chair. 
"Ar'right, lets go." He kicks back and relaxes.

"Get out of the seat Switchblade." replies Astroblast in a cold voice 
to Switchblade's antics.

"Suck on a rusty tin can," retorts Switchblade. He goes back to 
relaxing.

Astroblast takes off, circling once, to gain speed, then heads up 
towards outerspace. "Ya know, Switchblade, I could just have you 
kicked you out the hatch, and... oh look, that little blob there? Yah, 
that's our base. Imagine falling that far," He chuckles. "I suggest 
you move, now."

*Gulp* Switchblade swallows hard, "Uhhh, I'm moving." he finishes 
hastily. He then quickly leaps from the seat, and sits down on one 
of the benches along the walls to wait out the ride.

"Good," says Astroblast. "Megatron, your command chair awaits."


On 31 Mar 2001, at 22:39, Jeremiah wrote:

> Firedrill/Megatron/Cliffjumper/Motormaster.
> 
> Megatron smiles on the screen, seeing the allarms go off, and the ship
> shake, (it may not be, but Im assuming it is. If it isnt, then just ignore
> that). " Do try to stay healthy my dear" he says patronizingly, as he
> laughs (Megatrons trade mark laugh), a horrifying laugh. He turns away from
> the screen. "Come Cyclonus, Scourge, Switchblade, Motormaster. Destiny
> awaits us" he says as he walks out the door. Motormaster follows. They both
> climb into Astroblast. "Just follow us Cyclonus and Scourge. Astroblast,
> blast off, here is your destination" Megatron tell Astroblast, waiting for
> Switchblade to join them.
> 
> Firedrill looks on, hearing the explosions. He loses interest in the
> battle, and looks to the fire fight going on in the distance. "Hmmmmmm," He
> says wondering, but knows not to leave his position.
>
